column4: anybody: Is Dlink DGE-530T pci gigabit lan card plug and play on 6.06 Dapper Drake
boot off the live cd and see?
i didnt have to do anything with drivers, ubu handled it
intel cards are incredibly common and not very fancy
why would I do that when 6.06 is running on my HD
hmm maybe this isnt the official list
damn you google, first android and now this
eDToaCH: it says the card runs on 7.04 - no word on 6.06
you could just go to the manufacturers site and see
eDToaCH: I want to go out and buy one, but thought I would make sure
then id def go to the manufacturers site and see
doesnt look like ubu maintains an official HCL, which kinda sucks actually
I went there but the Linux support is generic or Redhat in nature
just querying to see if anyone used the card on 6.06
